description: In most Minecraft worlds, pickaxes tend to be the first things I make (after planks and sticks, of course). Boy, this new progression system really makes you appreciate the little things in life, eh?
Now that you have a pickaxe, I'd recommend to start mining immediately. Get as much coal as you can, and maybe dig out a small hole to spend the night.
/a/TIP: If you just want to clear blocks without processing them, don't waste pickaxe durability! Craft a hammer and chisel from /d/Spelunkery/d/./a/
